projects.name: LineageOS
projects.description: Being a member of the LineageOS team for a several years, I've maintained ports for several devices, such as the Samsung Galaxy S4 and the Xiaomi Redmi 3S. I've also worked on user-facing features in the framework and apps, such as the LineageParts app and the touchscreen gestures that come with it.

projects.name: Xmas and Friends
projects.tagline: gamifying Chinese learning for elementary students
projects.description: Together with a team of schoolmates, we've designed and built a Unity mobile game revolving around various festivities in Singapore. The game aims to make the learning of Chinese more enjoyable for elementary students. The game was built with Unity, and was done as part of a national competition.

projects.name: Flash cards
projects.description: Quick flash cards for learning on the go. Made initially to aid myself in revisions for my examinations.
